resources.string: For severe thinness, focus on strength and muscle building exercises. Consult a fitness trainer for personalized workout routines.
Include resistance training and cardio exercises in your routine. Start with light weights and gradually increase intensity.
Incorporate bodyweight exercises like push-ups, squats, and lunges. Also, include aerobic exercises to improve stamina.
Maintain a balanced exercise routine with a mix of cardio and strength training exercises. Focus on staying active and healthy.
Emphasize cardio exercises like jogging, cycling, or swimming to burn calories. Include strength training to build muscle mass.
Combine high-intensity interval training (HIIT) with strength exercises. Include activities like running, jumping jacks, and weightlifting.
Consult a fitness expert or a healthcare professional for personalized exercise programs. Focus on low-impact exercises to avoid strain on joints.
